hero.title: Lazuno – For True Admirers of Quality
hero.subtitle: Discover high-quality, stylish furniture to suit every room and every taste. Comfort and elegance for your dream home

partner.title: Our primary suppliers and partners.
partner.text: At Lazuno Uz, we don’t just make furniture—we craft experiences. Every piece tells a story, turning spaces into places where memories are made. With 1,500+ designs, we bring style, comfort, and durability to every home. Your dream space starts here.

statistic.card3_title: A decade of expertise in furniture design and innovation.

about-us.card1_title: Lazuno Uz: Crafting Comfort & Style Since 2016
about-us.card1_text: For nearly a decade, Lazuno has been redefining furniture craftsmanship in Uzbekistan. With over 1,500 unique designs, we offer a diverse selection that blends aesthetics with durability. Our commitment to innovation and quality ensures that every piece we create is not just furniture but a statement of style and functionality. Each product is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans using premium materials, combining traditional weaving techniques with modern technology. Based in Tashkent, we take pride in producing furniture that enhances spaces and enriches lifestyles—whether it’s a cozy garden retreat or a stylish indoor setup. At Lazuno we don’t just make furniture—we create experiences.
about-us.card2_text: Since 2016, Lazuno has been the go-to name for furniture that merges elegance with resilience. Our collection of over 1,500 options ensures that there’s a perfect fit for every taste and space. We believe furniture should be more than just functional—it should inspire. That’s why we use carefully selected artificial rattan and other premium materials, expertly woven by artisans who bring years of craftsmanship to every piece. From timeless classics to contemporary designs, our furniture is built to stand the test of time. Whether you're looking to transform your home, garden, or commercial space, Lazuno delivers excellence—one handcrafted piece at a time.

contact-us.title: Let’s get in touch!
contact-us.subtitle: For the past 7+ years, our company has been fully dedicated to enhancing and refining the process of crafting high-quality garden furniture in a wide range of formats, styles, and designs.
contact-us.name_error3: Name must be at least 5 characters long
contact-us.name_error4: Name must contain at least one uppercase or lowercase letter
contact-us.message_error2: Message must be at least 10 characters long
contact-us.message_error3: Message must contain at least one uppercase or lowercase letter

accardion.shipping: At Lazuno, we make sure your furniture arrives safely, quickly, and hassle-free. We deliver across Uzbekistan with trusted logistics partners who handle every item with care. Once your order is confirmed, we’ll contact you to schedule delivery at your convenience. From factory to your front door — we take care of everything.
accardion.packaging: Your furniture isn’t just wrapped — it’s protected like royalty. Every item is carefully packed using shock-absorbing materials to prevent scratches, dents, or damage. Whether it’s a compact coffee table or a full-sized wardrobe, we make sure it travels safely. Unboxing Lazuno furniture should feel just as premium as using it.
accardion.return: We don’t offer returns — because we prioritize precision from day one. Each piece is crafted to match your exact preferences and approved before delivery. However, every product comes with a strong>3-year guarantee to ensure your peace of mind. If there’s any issue caused by manufacturing defects, we’ll repair or replace it — no stress, no extra cost.
